Posts.Content: Sep 27, 2007 12:05AM - edited Sep 27, 2007 12:05AM by Hana With your family history I would definitely pick mastectomy. Why worry about it in future. Just find dependable and skilled plastic surgeon. My reconstructed breast is just a perfect twin to my good breast and I am D cup! Good luck and wishes that everything will work out for you.
